brief_summary.textblock:
The objectives of this study is to assess the characteristics and frequency of adenovirus
      conjunctivitis in a population of male and female patients from one year of age who present
      signs and symptoms of acute conjunctivitis.

clinical_study.brief_title: ADenoVirus Initiative Study in Epidemiology in France

detailed_description.textblock:
Epidemiological, prospective, open, multicentric trial in patients suffering from acute
      conjunctivitis who will undergo a rapid diagnostic test for adenoviral conjunctivitis at the
      time of their visit to the ophthalmologist office, at the emergency room or during
      hospitalization. This epidemiological study will include approximately 500 patients in
      France. The planned duration of the study is one year from the first patient visit to the
      last patient visit.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Male or Female patients of at least one year of age presenting acute (for less than 7
             days) conjunctivitis signs and symptoms.

          -  Patient or / and legal representative (if patient below 18 years of age) must be able
             to provide oral consent for the collection and treatment of the questionnaire data.

          -  No history of hypersensitivity to corn starch, talcum powder or Dacron (sampling
             fleece components).

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Current use or having received (within the last 7 days) local antiviral therapies
             such as povidone iodine or ganciclovir, or topical steroids or immunomodulators such
             as cyclosporine which may interfere with the test result.

          -  Previous enrolment in the present study.

          -  Any direct involvement with the study conduct at site or any family link with study
             site staff.

study_pop.textblock:
Any female and male patients from one year of age with signs and symptoms of acute
        conjunctivitis either seen during ophthalmology consultations or who are in the emergency
        room or hospitalized, can be enrolled in the study

clinical_study.keyword: Adenoviral conjunctivitis diagnosed with AdenoPlus™ Test

facility.name: Centre Hospitalier National d'Ophtalmologie des Quinze-Vingts
Groupe Hospitalier La Pitié Salpêtrière-Charles Foix

clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiological, Prospective, Multicentric, Open Study To Assess The Characteristics And Frequency Of Adenoviral Conjunctivitis As Diagnosed With The Point Of Care AdenoPlus® Test In Patients Suffering From Acute Conjunctivitis

other_outcome.description: The number of patients with adenovirus conjunctivitis who visited the ophthalmologist in spring, summer, autumn and winter and their geographic area (e.g. by hospital, by area).
other_outcome.time_frame: During the visit to the ophthalmologist before and just after the AdenoPlus® test done on the same day (one visit)

other_outcome.description: The percentage of each eye signs and symptoms, the mean duration of the disease for both the patients with positive and negative AdenoPlus® tests, the number or follow-up visit done and the correlation between the initial diagnosis (before AdenoPlus® test results) and the final diagnosis (post AdenoPlus® test results).
other_outcome.time_frame: During the visit to the ophthalmologist before and just after the AdenoPlus® test done on the same day (one visit)

other_outcome.description: Estimation of resource utilized during course of treatment (use of drugs, number of visits done by the patient…), and associated costs (which would be calculated by applying unit costs to resource use).
other_outcome.measure: Resource utilization during the treatment and evaluation of the costs
other_outcome.time_frame: On day 1: at least once during the single visit  to the ophthalmologist and if any also during the follow-up visit(s)

other_outcome.description: Number of days out of work and/or out of school linked to this disease.
other_outcome.measure: Patient/parent absenteeism linked to this disease.
other_outcome.time_frame: On day 1: at least once during the single visit to the ophthalmologist and if any also during the follow-up visit(s)

other_outcome.description: Number of adverse incidents (AIs) and events that are of significant (SEs) reported to Nicox
other_outcome.time_frame: On day 1: at least once during the single visit to the ophthalmologist and if any also during the follow-up visit(s)

primary_outcome.description: The  percentage of patients with adenovirus conjunctivitis documented by a positive AdenoPlus® test over the tested population of male and female patients who present signs and symptoms of acute conjunctivitis.
primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of patients with adenovirus conjunctivitis
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the visit to the ophthalmologist before and just after the AdenoPlus® test done on the same day (one visit)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
